interfaces

Class TransactionInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.TransactionInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class TransactionInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for the transaction interface that the user will see. This allows users to perform transactions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ATM atm
      The ATM that this interface runs on.
      private GeneralInterfaceMethods general
      GeneralInterfaceMethods represents a class that contains helper methods that TransactionInterface uses.
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      The scanner attribute for user inputs

    • Method Detail

      • displayTransactionMenu

        public void displayTransactionMenu(User user)
        The transaction menu that the user sees
        Parameters:
        user - the user that is viewing the transaction menu

      • printOptions

        private void printOptions()
        The options that that user can pick from in the transaction menu. The user is allowed to perform the following transactions.

      • deposit

        private void deposit(User user)
        Allows the user to deposit into their account. Each deposit and the amount that will be deposited is read from deposits.txt and the deposit will always go into their primary chequing account.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to perform the deposit

      • withdraw

        private void withdraw(User user)
        Allows the user to withdraw from their account.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to withdraw from their account

      • transferIn

        private void transferIn(User user)
        Allows the user to transfer in to their account from another one of their accounts.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to transfer in

      • transferOut

        private void transferOut(User user)
        Allows the user to transfer out from one of their accounts to another one of their accounts. You cannot transfer out from a credit card account.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to transfer out

      • payBill

        private void payBill(User user)
        Allows the user to pay bill from one of their accounts to a receiver.
        Parameters:
        user - the user that would like to pay a bill

      • writeObject

        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to store the TransactionInterface object.
        Parameters:
        oos - instance of the ObjectOutputStream class to write the trasnaction interface object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • readObject

        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to restore the transaction interface's information after the ATM is restarted.
        Parameters:
        ois - instance of the ObjectInputStream class used to deserialize object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • readObjectNoData

        private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Used in serialization when class inheritance is not as expected
        Throws:
        java.io.ObjectStreamException - when an attempt to deserialize a back-reference fails
